risen_sacrifice.name: Risen Sacrifice

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

risen_sacrifice.description: The gaunt form of a human used in ritual sacrifice that has refused to stay dead. It smiles as it wanders sleepily through the caverns.

celebrant.name: Eternal Cult Celebrant

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

celebrant.description: A horrifically scarred human who clutches a dagger as it wanders through the scratch-marked tunnels. The cult demands more sacrifices.

kidnapper.name: Eternal Cult Kidnapper

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

kidnapper.description: The flow of new flesh into the Palace of Hedonism must be constant. This cloaked figure ensures that this commandment is upheld.
